question.title: What is the primary cause of frostbite?

option_a.title: Cold temperatures and wind
option_a.description: Cold temperatures and wind can contribute to the development of frostbite

option_b.title: Poor blood circulation and genetics
option_b.description: Poor blood circulation and genetics can increase the risk of frostbite

option_c.title: Frostbite is only caused by exposure to extreme cold
option_c.description: Frostbite is only caused by exposure to extreme cold

option_d.title: Hypothermia and dehydration
option_d.description: Hypothermia and dehydration can lead to frostbite
